definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

sentences.english: The umbrella in the hand fallen off in the floor, he lived her with the hands garland.
sentences.chinese: 手中的雨傘掉落在地，他用雙手環住了她。

sentences.english: He turned on the shower and I dropped the towel, then placed my arms around his waist.
sentences.chinese: 他打開蓮蓬頭，我丟掉毛巾，他讓我環住他的腰。
